schoolSuccess.app-run:
THIS APP WILL RUN
IN THE BACKGROUND
schoolSuccess.app-run-desc: Your school data will be collected when device is on. You can close the App.

searchCountry.country-not-accurate: It looks like the country you selected may not be accurate to your location. Are you sure you want to continue?
searchCountry.not-available: Sorry, {{appName}} {{appNameSuffix}} App is not available in this country. Please choose another country.

searchSchool.provide-school-id: Please type & enter your school ID
searchSchool.user-has-not-id: Once you type your school ID we will search for ids that match with your input.

faq.what-is-school-id-desc: A school ID is a unique identifier for your school that was provided by the government. There are different formats, but usually looks something like "BR12345" or "12345678"
faq.how-find-school-id: How do I find my school ID?
faq.how-find-school-id-desc: Your school administrator or IT department will know. The school ID will be the number that is used in your national registration system.
faq.school-id-not-found: My school is not part of {{appName}} yet. What can I do?
faq.school-id-not-found-desc: You can visit our website and fill out the contact form to indicate to us that you would like to join our initiative.
faq.can-close-app-desc: Yes, you can close the application by clicking the close button in the top right. The application will continue running in the background and will report your connectivity status.
faq.connectivity-checks-occur:
When do my school's
connectivity checks occur?
faq.connectivity-checks-occur-desc: There are always two checks per day that occur at random. The average speed between the two is the speed that will be reported as your daily speed.
faq.can-change-id: Can I change my school ID?
faq.can-change-id-desc: Right now it is not possible to change your school ID. If you've made a mistake and need to enter a new ID, you should uninstall the application and start over.
faq.multiple-installs:
Can I install this application
on more than one computer?
faq.multiple-installs-desc: Yes you can. In fact, we encourage it. If multiple machines report data to the platform, the measurement will be more reliable
faq.dissatisfied-speed:
What can I do if I am unhappy
with the speed or reliability of
my internet connection?
faq.dissatisfied-speed-desc: You can visit our site and fill out the form to file a report. We can then work with our suppliers to ensure they deliver the quality of service they promised.

app.project-connect-desc: {{appName}} is mapping the connectivity of every school in the world. We aim to connect all schools to the Internet and all young people to information, opportunity and choice.
app.thank-you: Thank you for contributing to {{appName}}. Find your school and learn more at our website. We add new schools every day!

startTest.testFailedDesc: The connection was interupted before testing could be completed.
